table.name: vtiger_servicedetails
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicedetails` ( `servicedetailsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `servicedetailsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `service_qty` int(5) DEFAULT NULL, `service_price` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `service_amount` decimal(16,8) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicedetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_servicedetailscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicedetailscf` ( `servicedetailsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicedetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
